data.what_is:
As businesses are faced with exponentially expanding volumes of information, and data becomes an integral part of their infrastructure, technology platforms must help harness the power of the data to catalyze better decision making, risk evaluation and customer engagement.

Aptum enables customers to unlock the potential of their data infrastructure to drive tangible business outcomes and maximize the value of their technology investments.

With solutions encompassing Data Center, Cloud, and Connectivity, Aptum offers genuine choice and adaptability combined with international reach spanning North America, Latin America and Europe. In Canada, Aptum is the first neutral host provider of turnkey small cell connectivity, augmenting an extensive fiber metro network across Toronto and Montreal.

Partnering with Aptum gives customers access to deep technical expertise from initial consultation, through architecture and design, to ongoing management, support and optimization. Built on a 20-year heritage helping customers maximize new technologies to store, manage, move and secure their critical data, Aptum provides true hybrid infrastructure solutions internationally, with consistency, compliancy and data security.

i would higher recommend Peer 1 fo those who don't mind paying a slightly higher price.  The service is solid and service is excellent.
